Posts.EditableText: I am running a tutorial game on my browser and wanted to try it with my downloaded copy of quest. Is it possible to download my save?
Posts.HTML: I am running a tutorial game on my browser and wanted to try it with my downloaded copy of quest. Is it possible to download my save?

Posts.EditableText: Go to the Create tab on this website, there's a Download button next to your online games there.
Posts.HTML: Go to the Create tab on this website, there's a Download button next to your online games there.
